inspiration.preheader: You've made great progress in refining your wardrobe. Let's keep building on that!
inspiration.hero_image_description: A curated collection of Banana Republic outfits showcasing timeless elegance and modern sophistication.
inspiration.first_paragraph: We noticed you haven't been exploring your style with us lately. Remember when you first discovered Banana Republic and the confidence it brought to your wardrobe? Let's reignite that spark and continue crafting your unique look.

nostalgia.subject_line: Your Timeless Style with Banana Republic
nostalgia.preheader: Celebrating the moments you've dressed to impress with us.
nostalgia.hero_image_description: A nostalgic collage of Banana Republic's iconic styles over the years, highlighting classic pieces.
nostalgia.first_paragraph: We've cherished the moments you've chosen Banana Republic to express your style. From your first purchase to your favorite outfits, your journey with us has been unforgettable. Let's continue creating timeless memories together.
nostalgia.second_title: A Legacy of Style and Trust

first.template: You've been part of our community for {{customer.relationship_value}} years.
first.fallback: You've been part of our community, creating timeless style moments.

second.fallback: You've invested in timeless pieces that define your style.

social_proof.preheader: Be part of a community that values timeless elegance and modern sophistication.
social_proof.hero_image_description: A vibrant community of Banana Republic customers showcasing their favorite outfits and style tips.
social_proof.first_paragraph: Our community of style enthusiasts is growing every day, and we'd love for you to continue being part of it. Discover how others are elevating their wardrobes with Banana Republic and join the conversation.
